title: Is the XFL here to stay? Is Taysom Hill a franchise quarterback? (Football 2/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to discuss the XFL and pressing quarterback situations in New Orleans and Dallas. The guys break down the opening weekend of the XFL (1:35), analyzing the innovation the league displayed, rules the NFL could potentially adopt, DFS angles and a lookahead to Week 2. Next, Will and Brady hit on Taysom Hill in what has somehow become a huge storyline in the NFL (35:30). What is he really worth? And what's the Cowboys' plan for Dak Prescott (39:30)? Those answers and more on this 'hump day' edition of the Pick Six podcast.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @Brady_Quinn

itunes:subtitle: The XFL had a solid opening weekend, but is this finally the start-up league that will have staying power? Will Brinson and Brady Quinn break it down.
